entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,445Chapters: 10/75Kudos: 19

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: Blood and Ashes
entry.summary:
Author: lavieboheme0919

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,347Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 31

Summary: Several centuries after the Last Battle, the White Tower stands taller than ever—rebuilt, restructured, and reeling from new threats that no one dares name aloud. Saidin has returned, cleansed and chaotic, and the Hall of the Tower seeks control more than balance. When Stiles—a powerful male channeler raised to Aes Sedai—survives a narrow vote in the Hall for flouting Tower law and custom, he’s spared gentling… but not punishment.Bound without consent to Sitters from opposing Ajahs, declared the first Striker since the Age of Legends, Stiles finds himself weaponized by a Tower that fears what it cannot command. But Stiles is not their dog to tame, and the Tower is not as united as it pretends to be. As ancient tensions simmer and forgotten enemies stir, bonds—both sacred and profane—will be tested.This is not the story of the Dragon. This is what comes after.Power without trust. Bonds without love. And one man who will burn down the Pattern before letting them leash him again.Note: There will be some AI-generated art for an important moment from each chapter at the end of each chapter.

entry.title: DON’T DIE, DUMBASS
entry.summary:
Author: Noctirax

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,847Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 43

Summary: Stiles was certain—utterly certain—there had been someone in the middle of the road. Sure, the figure had moved with an unnatural quickness, vanishing as suddenly as he appeared but that didn't mean anything. Just standard Beacon Hills bullshit—home to the strange and unexplained. No, that wasn't what bothered him. What bothered him was that he hadn’t just seen someone. He’d seen someone he was damn sure he knew. Dark hair against pale skin, and leather jacket over broad shoulders, body squared, braced for impact. It was a posture Stiles had seen countless times, most often standing between him and something that was trying to rip his throat out. For a fleeting second, amidst the screech of tires and the adrenaline flooding his system, Stiles could have sworn he’d seen Derek Hale standing in the middle of the road. Only that wasn't possible because Derek was dead, very, very dead.

entry.title: Oh my God, Derek!
entry.summary:
Author: LS_5Ever

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,547Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 121

Summary: When the Sheriff hears Stiles yell Dereks name, Stiles has to think of a quick excuse. The Sheriff is not impressed.***“Yep. Yep, said his name,” Stiles confirmed, wincing. “Totally normal. Happens all the time. You know, just thinking about, uh —”Derek leaned in a little, hands planted on the bed, either side of Stiles, boxing him in, voice low and unhelpful. “What exactly were you thinking about, Stiles?”Stiles shot him a look. “Shut up,” he whispered furiously before raising his voice to respond to his dad. “Just thinking about Derek! Classic… fantasy.”

entry.title: Just Kids, Once
entry.summary:
Author: hubrys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 83,947Chapters: 9/13Kudos: 146

Summary: “You left. Just like that. No goodbyes. No nothing.”“Stiles, I—”“Don’t. You walked away, Derek. After everything. I needed you to stay.”“I didn’t know how.”“You weren’t the first to go. Maybe just the one I hoped wouldn’t.”_________________________________________________________________________________________________________________They grew up clinging to each other in a house that promised nothing. Years later, Stiles dances in a cage and Derek’s about to get married. Some stories don’t start with love. Some start when everything else has already fallen apart.

entry.title: Book 1: The Triskele / Book 2: The Mischief / Book 3(A/B): The Triskele and the Mischief
entry.summary:
Author: Solinvictus22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,842Chapters: 32/?Kudos: 27

Summary: (FIXED AND EDITED; UNTIL CHAPTER 30)Trilogy wrapped into one:Book 1: Nemes(plural, pronounced nim/s) are people naturally born with connection to the primordial energies of the Earth enabling them to cast magic, Stiles is born a Neme and so is the prince he guards, while they have the war on their heads, against Neme-hunters of Edenia, humans who unlocked the science that may end the age of magic users.Book 2: Stiles' life turned upside down after engaging himself with dark magic, unknowingly the consequence of his actions weights more dreadful than just losing his light magic: the birth of the MischiefBook 3A: With the royalties and soldier mages reunited, they must finally face their greatest common enemy, Deucalion and his cult.Book 3B: Argesh has distracted itself by its inner conflict, Edenia has hibernated long enough to reinforce their anti magic tech to swoop the magical kingdoms with its storm.

entry.title: A Gentleman's Liaisons
entry.summary:
Author: house_of_lantis

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,732Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Peter Hale, the Duke of Beacon Hills, was content to live his life as a gentleman of leisure and an utter scoundrel, courting every pleasure available…but, he was bored. He needed a new challenge. He needed a new rival, an opponent who had the same access and skills to the playground. Chris Argent was born a gentleman who liked to get his hands dirty. But will he fall for Peter’s games or start one of his own?

entry.title: Unveiled
entry.summary:
Author: Dexterous_Sinistrous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,875Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 468

Summary: Stiles’ hands were shaking as he took a handful of his veil, though he wished he could act bravely and just tear the material off. He slowly began to lift the veil, his heartbeat racing as he continued to look at the Alpha through the material.'There isn’t another way', Stiles reassured himself.His veil felt heavier than it should as he lifted it over his chin.Calloused hands grasped Stiles’ wrists in a tight hold.Stiles was startled, his actions halted. His veil was hanging just below his lips as he observed the Alpha.~*~Or, can love blossom while hidden by a veil?
